name: Minecraft Ripoff
description:
Description

Hello! This is a minecraft ripoff l've been working on. The game has random levels but it's on early dev so for now, you can play a demo world! The size is pretty much 10 chunks and the voxel size is 1000 blocks ( (10 x 10) x 10 ).

How to play

Arrows keys to move.

Left click to destroy.

Right click to build what you point at.

R to reset world.

If you mistakely fall, you will spawn close to your original spawn.

Remember, this is a demo world. You need to edit the generator values in the assembly to change the world Credits:

Red Hen dev: for a basic minecraft terrain generation tutorial.

l did some other rest, like getting the original materials, and making multiply chunks instead of one.
